McKissick Academy of Science and Technology
Extracurriculars and Field Trips During Closure

div.p: We are proud to serve all of Pickens County with 14 elementary schools, five middle schools, four high schools, and a state-of-the-art Career and Technology Center.

With an annual enrollment of about 16,300 students, SDPC is the 15th largest school district in South Carolina, and our students consistently rank near the top of the state in academic achievement.
Our vision is to provide a quality 21st century education that prepares all students for success beyond the classroom.

span.style: font-size: 13.3333px; letter-spacing: 0.07px; line-height: 21px; font-family: Arial;;font-family: arial;
